spec_data.Name: petit
spec_data.Description:
Log analysis tool which is useful to systems administrators & systems
analysts. It interacts with syslog and Apache logs to clarify what is
happening in logs.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 07:03:22 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Log analysis tool for syslog, Apache and raw log files
